name: part_004
file: tmp_【#SSholoX1周年】世界の全てを見せてやろう【お披露目満載！？】 [fzlZDM_M5bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe takes her turn as the crane in the human crane game, with Kazama Iroha pedaling to provide power.
The group discusses the results of Sakamata's turn, having collected 14 items.
Sakamata complains about Iroha's crane operation, and they decide that Hakui Koyori will be the next crane with Takane Lui pedaling.
Takane Lui gets on the bicycle generator while Hakui Koyori is lifted into the air as the crane.
Hakui Koyori's turn begins. She accidentally picks up a "red" item which causes an explosion, but they decide to continue the game.

subtitles.original: はい！行って行って！
subtitles.english: Yes! Go, go!

subtitles.original: 行け行け！いいぞいいぞ！
subtitles.english: Go, go! Looking good!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ沙花叉！行け行け！
subtitles.english: Go for it, Sakamata! Go, go!

subtitles.original: あ、なんか上の方に…行け行け！
subtitles.english: Ah, it's going up... Go, go!

subtitles.original: あと少し！
subtitles.english: Just a bit more!

subtitles.original: あと20秒！あと20秒！
subtitles.english: 20 seconds left! 20 seconds left!

subtitles.original: 行ける行ける！頑張れ頑張れ！
subtitles.english: You can do it! Keep going!

subtitles.original: え、待って！赤くない？赤くない？
subtitles.english: Wait, isn't it red? Isn't it red?

subtitles.original: 離せ離せ！離して！
subtitles.english: Release it! Let go!

subtitles.original: 行ける行ける！はい、はい！
subtitles.english: You can do it! Yes, yes!

subtitles.original: 店員さん！店員さん呼んで！店員さん！
subtitles.english: Clerk! Call the clerk! Clerk!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで何体だった？
subtitles.english: So, how many was it?

subtitles.original: はい、ということで黄色も取って14体！大収穫です！
subtitles.english: Alright, so with the gold one, that's 14! A great harvest!

subtitles.original: 14体？…え、あと一回しかできないのに14？
subtitles.english: 14?! ...Eh, even though there's only one try left, 14?

subtitles.original: 黄色ね、取ってくれなかったからな…
subtitles.english: Because you didn't get the gold one...

subtitles.original: 凄く黄色のそばに落ちたのにね！
subtitles.english: It fell right next to the gold one!

subtitles.original: お前ら！助けてよ！
subtitles.english: You guys! Help me!

subtitles.original: ルイ姉は何も悪くないよね。
subtitles.english: Lui-nee isn't at fault at all, right?

subtitles.original: 下手クソなんだよ！
subtitles.english: You're so bad at this!

subtitles.original: 待って、なんか…どれだけ大変だと思ってんだよ、こっち！
subtitles.english: Wait... how hard do you think it is for me?!

subtitles.original: そんなことないでござるよ。重たいでござるよ。
subtitles.english: That's not true. It was heavy.

subtitles.original: なんで？重い？
subtitles.english: Why? Is it heavy?

subtitles.original: 自転車漕いでいる人がわかるの？重い？
subtitles.english: Does the person pedaling the bike feel it? Is it heavy?

subtitles.original: でも待って、いろはが息がちょっと上がってるから。
subtitles.english: But wait, Iroha is a bit out of breath.

subtitles.original: 本当に最後頑張ったら…
subtitles.english: I really did my best at the end...

subtitles.original: じゃあ、もう一回いろは行ける？
subtitles.english: Then, can Iroha go again?

subtitles.original: いや、バカバカ！何言ってんの？
subtitles.english: No, you idiot! What are you saying?

subtitles.original: お前がやるんだよ！
subtitles.english: You're the one doing it!

subtitles.original: なんかね、散々って言ってたから…
subtitles.english: Since you were saying such harsh things...

subtitles.original: 上のものをやらせてやるよ。
subtitles.english: I'll let you be the one on top.

subtitles.original: お前がクレーンになって、お前が捕獲。
subtitles.english: You become the crane, and you catch them.

subtitles.original: 仕方ないな。ルイにやらせてください。
subtitles.english: Can't be helped. Please let Lui do it.

subtitles.original: マジでさ、思ってる以上にやばいことスタートしたよね。
subtitles.english: Seriously, we started something way crazier than I thought.

subtitles.original: これマジでやばい。本当にやばいでござるよ。
subtitles.english: This is seriously bad. It's really bad.

subtitles.original: いろはちゃんが息上がってて、沙花叉も大変なことになってるからね。
subtitles.english: Iroha-chan is out of breath, and Sakamata is in a bit of a state too.

subtitles.original: 症状も見せられないよが…
subtitles.english: I can't even show the situation...

subtitles.original: え、でも空飛べる気持ちになりそうだから大丈夫かな？
subtitles.english: Eh, but I might feel like I'm flying in the sky, so will it be okay?

subtitles.original: 舐めてもらったら困るでござる。
subtitles.english: Don't underestimate it.

subtitles.original: 俺たち飛んだしね。
subtitles.english: We flew too, right?

subtitles.original: そろそろ準備ができたんじゃないか？
subtitles.english: Isn't it about time the preparations are finished?

subtitles.original: 現場の鷹嶺さん！鷹嶺さん！
subtitles.english: Takane-san on the scene! Takane-san!

subtitles.original: あ、いいでござるな。似合うんよ、なんか爽やか。
subtitles.english: Ah, that's good. It suits you, looks refreshing.

subtitles.original: 奥様みたいだね。ジムに来た奥様。
subtitles.english: Like a housewife. A housewife who came to the gym.

subtitles.original: 爽やかだな。口説きたいな。
subtitles.english: How refreshing. I want to hit on her.

subtitles.original: え、じゃあ、こよりちゃん？発進！
subtitles.english: Eh, so, Koyori-chan? Launch!

subtitles.original: こよりちゃん、飛んでおります！
subtitles.english: Koyori-chan, she's flying!

subtitles.original: 白鳥になっている！こよりさん！
subtitles.english: She's becoming a swan! Koyori-san!

subtitles.original: お前、覚えてるよ、先までの。
subtitles.english: You, I'll remember what happened until now.

subtitles.original: 丁寧に、丁寧に扱ってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Handle me gently, handle me gently, please!

subtitles.original: はい、というわけで丁寧に扱いますよ！
subtitles.english: Yes, so I will handle you gently!

subtitles.original: 絶対扱わねえ、こいつ！
subtitles.english: No way she'll handle you gently!

subtitles.original: 準備ができたみたいなんんで。ゲームスタート！
subtitles.english: Looks like preparations are ready. Game start!

subtitles.original: 私は見てるだけでいいから。
subtitles.english: I'm fine just watching.

subtitles.original: エイム力ってもの見せてくださいよ！
subtitles.english: Please show me your aiming skills!

subtitles.original: 黄色、黄色が…赤さが気になるんだけど。
subtitles.english: Gold, the gold... but I'm worried about the red.

subtitles.original: 行ける行ける！行け行け行け！
subtitles.english: You can do it! Go, go, go!

subtitles.original: 行け行け！
subtitles.english: Go, go!

subtitles.original: おっけー！また胸熱を感じる。
subtitles.english: Okay! I'm feeling that hot-bloodedness again.

subtitles.original: 上の方に存在よ。良さそう！
subtitles.english: It's up there. Looking good!

subtitles.original: ちょっとあとちょっとが取れないんだな。
subtitles.english: Ah, I just can't get that last bit.

subtitles.original: 行ける行ける！行け行け行け！
subtitles.english: You can do it! Go, go, go!

subtitles.original: ことこと…なんだこれ？
subtitles.english: Kotto kotto... what's this?

subtitles.original: え、赤？離せ離せ離せ！
subtitles.english: Eh, red? Release it! Let go!

subtitles.original: ないないない、赤って！
subtitles.english: No no no, red?!

subtitles.original: 赤は爆発だね。
subtitles.english: Red means explosion.

subtitles.original: こよりちゃん、無事ですか？大丈夫ですか？
subtitles.english: Koyori-chan, are you safe? Are you okay?

subtitles.original: 現場のこよりさん、大丈夫ですか？
subtitles.english: Koyori-san on the scene, are you okay?

subtitles.original: こより混ぜてない…聞いてないよ！
subtitles.english: Koyori, don't mix... I didn't hear about this!

subtitles.original: 爆発したら3分より前で終わってしまう。
subtitles.english: If it explodes, it ends before the 3 minutes are up.

subtitles.original: エイム下手クソ！もう一回もう一回！
subtitles.english: Your aiming is so bad! One more time, one more time!

subtitles.original: 叩け叩け！こよりを叩け！
subtitles.english: Hit it, hit it! Hit Koyori!

subtitles.original: まだやってもいいらしいです。
subtitles.english: Looks like we can still keep going.

subtitles.original: まだやっていいの？いいの？やるやる！
subtitles.english: We can still do it? Really? Let's do it!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ！黄色の玉まで持ってって！
subtitles.english: Good luck! Take it to the gold ball!

subtitles.original: 行け行け行け！
subtitles.english: Go, go, go!
